There blood draw assess safety vaccine well level immune response generate vaccine . Upon receipt preliminary safety result , Kenya phase begin 30 volunteer randomize receive either 50 µg FMP010 AS01B ( 20 ) rabies vaccine ( 10 ) . Vaccination schedule US phase follow-up 112 day .
